scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: An Esmeralda of Rocky Canonby Bret Harte, cased in cloth protection portfolio, accompanying the manuscript is a paper wrapper used as a mailing envelope, with the following note in Harte's writing, "Ms. of An Esmeralda of Rocky Canonabout 4800 words. Finished September 7th, 1897. Headley." AMsS, 9 p., with envelope [1897 Sep 7]
